text: Photogenic stud launde, bhai tere first year mein harkatein dekh ke mein to darr gaya tha. Aur First year mein wo treasure hunt night, bharatnatyam (koi samjhao uss ladki ko), pole dance sab kar liya tha. Majje aa gay the bro first year ke winter mein, wo robotics club mein battery phunkna aur MT ki chai, thand mein cycle ki race lagana. Phatta boi may your dreams come true aur milte rehna, kabhi rajasthan jayenge to milenge tumse jaroor.
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text: Pandey aur randi rona is constant. Was great to know you these 4 years pandey. Vivek sir ke lab me summer project se shuru karke apna so called start up (backup for pandey agar placement nahi lagi), Bhai majje aye bohot. Aur akhir mein mujhe sacchi mein nahin pata mere ENG423 mein number kaise aate the :P.
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text: I will always remember that moment when I asked you " Do you know X ?" and you are like haan banda tha wo mera, like legit we laughed for 5 mins straight, lol. Thank you for the TMI that day, i guess. Also I do not know humne wo MSE203 ka endsem kaise nikala, kyunki raat bhar library mein padhai se jyada bulla kaata tha apan logon ne, lel.
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text: Dost XD ! From vivek sir's lab mein pandey ki lena to hanging out during endsems in the library I am grateful for everything and I wish it could have been more ! You have always been a very chill and understanding person in my eyes and I hope you continue to be so. There is still an year ahead of us in IITK, I hope we meet once more. You have been one of the most genuine people I have met on campus and I hope you overcome your demons and finally be free from everything that is troubling you someday. I don't know in which stage of life or which place we will meet again, but I hope we do !
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text: Chaapu  londe Dhakar ! Bro MSE department mein tujhe dekhke mehnat karne ki inspiration milti thi. 3 saal being in the same department and having all those discussions in classes were surely fun, but i wish humne padhai chodke bhi kuch maje kiye hote. Baaki mere questions ka answer mujhe hi nahin samajh mein aata tha, to tu kya samjhega :P. I hope tu aise hi chaapte rahe and hopefully we get to meet each other someday in some corner of the world !
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text: Faizi boi,I wish we had more chances to through daru ki bottles all over the campus. You are a fun and pretty chill guy and I hope you get to try everything that you want to ( you know what I am talking about :P). Have fun and keep the masti going !
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text: Hello the craziest person I know on campus,  the random quirks that you have sometimes drives people crazy but it makes us laugh a lot for sure. First year winter was nice, and oh i wish you could have a little less anger then. Raat ke 10 baje december ki thand mein patle patle tees pehenke raatko faizi boi ke scooty pe 80 ke speed se campus lautna yaad rahega. Kudos to all the fun we had then in the robo club, MT and canteen with akshit. I definitely am still inspired by how hard you manage to work on anything and I hope you planted your own time capsule (thank you for the idea lel) .
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text:
hello papaya ! Tu ekdum ek silent but constant companion raha throughout these 4 years, please forgive our taang khichai aur chidana wo hamara pyaar he tere liye LOL. Delhi mein aur achi bakchodi karni chahiye thi humein, aur haan rides pe chadne se darna band karo, Sherni ko kya muh dikhaoge ?
Btw tumhare commitment se ekdum inspired hein hum. Aur haan aise hi Kdrama dekhte raho aur humein company dete raho. In the end grudges mat rakho does not do you any good, khulo aur life enjoy karo pata chalega ki wo utna bhi kharab nahi he :)
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text: POOOOOOTDAR, from your super hawa hawaiyan baatein in the first year to our league adventures or late night canteen adventures it has been fun all along. Thank you for introducing me to Kpop and Manhwas, visual novels and what not. And thank you for always paying for my canteen expenses (which ended up as debt at the end of the month anyways). Tu apne kamre se jyada mere kamre pe dikh jaata tha lol. Anyways I hope you understand that getting angry on what we say to you sometimes does not do all of us any good, so I hope you let go of that and I hope to meet you soon, anywhere you are !
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text: Chutiye gadhe, insaan ban jaa. Baaki league ne zindagi barbaad kar rakhi he. Aise hi carry karte rehna humein. 3 saal roommate raha he launde, aage jaake bhul mat jaana. Aur hum yaad rakhenge tumhara amusement park mein rides pe chadne se darna aur college ke baad milenge to sahi ke roller coaster pe bithaunga tujhe. Thank you for all the things jo maine teri taapi hein lol, aur haan aise hi bottle mein paani bharke hamari seva karte raho hamari kripa bani rahegi tumpe :P
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text:
#2 continued
Kakashi ki gaand aise hi maarte rahenge aur zindagi ke majje lete rahenge. Aur mein kuch bohot important cheezein bhul gaya, THANK YOU (or maybe not) for teaching me gaali taaki uss bsdwaale MTH ke prof ko gaali de sakoon mein, Thank you for seeing K dramas with me and thank you for being the moderator in Kakashi vs me guess the Kpop song lol. Thank you for waking me up for a lot of classes and labs, mujhe nahin pata tere bina mein aadhe se jyaade courses mein pass bhi ho pata. Aur mujhe sehne ke liye thank you sir. Apna alag hi funda tha saale jab baaki roomies ko light on/off karne ki dikkat apan log ekdum bakchod, light on ho off ho so lete the, tension hi nahin.
Aapko spicy food khila ke rahenge sir, aur wo bhi non veg waali, next time plan banao south east asian seafood cuisine khaane chalenge kahin. Goa plan ke liye pehle ghar pe permission le gadhedo :P, aur goa jayenge to kakashi ko ekdum hardcore drugs karwayenge, ab to daaru se mann nahin maanega XD.
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text:
Boi oh boi meena boi XD ! Bro you have always been a constant companion in labs and a person who always lightens up the mood in a group. And you don't irritate people, it's your way of getting close to them, it's your go to ice breaker. Aur usi ke wajah se all of my lab projects with you were superb. To isliye tere harkatein majedaar hein, never lose them, never be ashamed of being like that. Tu aise hi bane rahe, chill maarte rahe, chaapte rahe aur maje karte rahe. 
PS : Ab ek hi cheez ki kami reh gayi, ki sirf apan log ko ek department trip pe nikalna tha. Par koi naa kabhi kisi jagah kisi mod pe milenge aur bakchodi pel lenge.
PPS: I am honored to be the witness to your very first tinder adventures in Mettalurgy lab was it ?
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text: PPPS : Valorant khel lenge boi, kabhi aao to sahi usme kya he
author: Subham Kumar Hota

text:
Arey bhai, beta MSE mein tumhi sahara the humare. Aalsi insaan thoda kaam karlo nahin lagg jayenge aapke. Baaki aise hi mast raho, aur chinta na karo ache PhD uthayenge dono, no cap. Ab next phir wahin milte hein phir chaapu launde, tab tak ke liye alvida sir !
PS : Campus khule to darshan de dijiyega
author: Subham Kumar Hota
